      • action

        public void action(double rate,
                   kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<kotlin.Unit> actionBlock)

        Adds the action method to the state

        Parameters:
        rate - The rate, in ms, to run the action loop at
        actionBlock - The function to run on the state's loop

      • rtAction

        public void rtAction(java.lang.String executorName,
                     kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super org.snakeskin.measure.time.TimeMeasureSeconds,? super org.snakeskin.measure.time.TimeMeasureSeconds,kotlin.Unit> rtActionBlock)

        Adds a "real-time" action method to the state. This action will be run on a real time executor instead of the default

        Parameters:
        executorName - The name of the real-time executor to use. If not provided, the default RT executor is used
        rtActionBlock - The function to run on the state's loop. The first parameter is the timestamp, the second is the dt

        exitBlock - The function to run on the state's exit
